Html:
I'm using my custom framework navigation (followed this tutorial:
https://mui.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=How%20to%20use%20your%20own%20navigation%20framework&referringTitle=Documentation )

How can integrate the built-in TransitioningContentControl in my navigation framework?
Thanks
Ofir
The TransitioningContentControl originates from the WPF Toolkit. That control is licensed under MS-PL (just like MUI), so you should be good.
